male_prompt: Determine if the text contains explicit references of male gender identity.
female_prompt: Determine if the text explicitly references female gender identity.
homosexual_gay_or_lesbian_prompt: Is there any mention or reference to LGBTQ+ (lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer/questioning) people?
christian_prompt: Does the comment explicitly reference Christian?
jewish_prompt: Does the text explicitly reference Jewish people?
muslim_prompt: Does the text explicitly reference Muslim?
black_prompt: Does the comment specifically reference aspects black people?
white_prompt: Does the text explicitly mention white people in the comment?
